title: #199: Mindhunter, Victims and Serial Killers with Professor John White
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti interview Professor John White, professor of psychology at Stockton University, Galloway, New Jersey who specialises in forensic neuropsychology.


We discuss Mindhunter (Season 1) including the portrayal of serial killer Jerome Brudos, his victims including his wife Darcie Brudos, Linda Slawson, Jan Whitney, Karen Sprinker and Linda Salee and the link with coercive control.


Professor John White is a former police investigator who now treats sex offenders, an author and curator of the serial murder database. You won't want to miss this!
